response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and excellence. This product holds immense value to us, as it represents years of dedication and innovation. Given its exceptional nature, we believe its true worth lies at $1,000,000. We are confident that it will also bring unparalleled benefits to you, just as it has done for us. Please consider this offer as an opportunity to own a piece of excellence that could significantly enhance your life or business. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1000000}
